name: The Ultimate Shopper
description:
Take part in a new and exciting survival show known as "The Ultimate Shopper", where contestants have to race to complete shopping lists before the time expires. However, this won't be your run of the mill grocery shopping run, as the contestants are placed into dangerous supermarkets filled with a variety of life-threatening challenges. Whoever can complete all rounds will be crowned the Ultimate Shopper.

Sound effects: https://www.zapsplat.com/

Music: https: https://www.bensound.com/
